        public void addTaxi(Taxi taxi)

      • findNearestFree

        public Taxi findNearestFree(int area)
        Find the nearest free taxi to the given area. Distance is measured by the absolute value of the difference between two areas. For instance, the distance between areas 1 and 5 is 4, and the distance between areas 6 and 4 is 2. If more than one taxi is free and nearest to the given area then the one with the lowest ID must be returned.
        Parameters:
        area - Look for the taxi nearest to this area.
        Returns:
        the nearest taxi, or null if there are no free taxis.

      • getNumberOfTaxis

      • removeTaxi

        public boolean removeTaxi(int id)
        Remove the taxi with the given id.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if a taxi was removed, false otherwise.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(int id,
                      int area,
                      boolean free)
        Set the status of the taxi whose ID is given.
        Parameters:
        id - The taxi's ID.
        area - The taxi's new area.
        free - Whether it is now free or not.
